Global Ecosystem Dynamics Investigation (GEDI) is a NASA satellite laser scanning mission focused on mapping of vegetation 3-D structure globally. GEDI data is publicly available and can be downloaded via a graphical user interface (GUI) using NASA EarthData Search or programmatically using NASA's Common Metadata Repository (CMR), earthaccess python package, or Harmony API â€“ for more info visit GEDI-Data-Resources github repo.

GEDI L2A (V002) product datasets used in the paper are listed below. Files were not included in this repository, since they are publicly accessible and including them in this repository would introduce storage redundancy.

GEDI02_A_2019115065354_O02072_02_T00763_02_003_01_V002.h5
